Source.Name: Storable
Source.Summary: Storable - persistence for Perl data structures
Source.Description: The Storable package brings persistence to your Perl data structures containing SCALAR, ARRAY, HASH or REF objects, i.e. anything that can be conveniently stored to disk and retrieved at a later time. It can be used in the regular procedural way by calling store with a reference to the object to be stored, along with the file name where the image should be written.
Bu paket diske yazmaya uygun Perl veri yapılarına süreklilik getirir. Her zamanki gibi yordamsal (procedural) yolla diske yazılacak nesne verilerek kullanılabilir.
